item.description:
Breakfast anyone?
This month we are having breafast for dinner. My favorite meal is breakfast but I rarely eat it in the normal morning hours. What about you?

The most fun aspect of our group is the lack of organization so there is no need to coordinate dishes or let us know what you are bringing - unless you really really want to share. Just believe that it will all work out and it will.

Join us this month with your favorit breakfast recipe. But remember part of the fun is thinking a little outside the breakfast box. Pack up the stuff you need and cook onsite. The kitchen will be filled with people cooking and chatting.

You know the drillâ€¦
Plan to assemble or cook on site unless your dish takes more than an hour to prepare. Bring any special equipment but I have standard kitchen tools and supplies.
item.how_to_find_us: my home so you will notice me and the dogs
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes February Meetup
